vulnerability.name: USN-7249-1
vulnerability.description: Xiantong Hou discovered that libvpx would overflow when attempting to allocate memory for very large images. If an application using libvpx opened a specially crafted file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause the application to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or the execution of arbitrary code.

statements.status_notes: libvpx could be made to crash or run programs as your login if it opened a specially crafted image file. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
